name: Bomby Bunny
description:
There's a bunny, and there's some landmines. Use your mine detector to sweep the maze for bombs, and find your hidden carrots!

A Game Jam game created during the Global Game Jam 2021.

Credits

Joona Lappalainen - Project leader and yleismies Jantunen

Niko Pyrhönen - Music and audio

Niko Kahilainen - Programmer a.k.a the code wizard

Sohvi Svensk - Graphic Designer, 2D art
